ingredients: 1 small potato, cut into cubes,   +   1/2 cup finely chopped cabbage,   +   1/4 cup fresh pomegranate seeds ,   +   1/2  carrot, cut into matchsticks, 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 1 clove garlic, minced,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt,   +   1/4 teaspoon brown sugar,   +   1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes
nutrition: Total Fat 3g 3%, Saturated Fat 0g 2%, Sodium 604mg 26%, Total Carbohydrate 23g 8%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 7g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 29mg 147%, Calcium 30mg 2%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 527mg 11%
